# Pinned Repositories

GitHub does not allow pinning repos via API, so this must be done manually.

## Instructions

1. Go to https://github.com/brandon-fryslie
2. Click "Customize your pins" below the profile picture
3. Pin these 6 repositories in this order:

## Recommended Pin List (in order)

1. **rad-shell** — flagship terminal system
   - Description already set: "Ultra fast, feature filled Zsh installation"
   - 41★, 8 years active, most-starred work

2. **oscilla-animator-v2** — current ambitious project
   - Description set via API: "Animation compiler with custom type system. Block-graph architecture, typed connections, 4-stage pipeline: parse → validate → optimize → emit."
   - 753 commits, active daily development

3. **cherry-chrome-mcp** — AI tooling for agents
   - Description set via API: "Chrome DevTools MCP server for AI agents. CSS selectors, dynamic tool visibility, 'Less is More' design."
   - Recent development (Jan 27 2026)

4. **browsergeist** — OS-level automation
   - Description set via API: "OS-level browser automation via virtual HID drivers. Physics-based cursor movement, OpenCV vision pipeline, undetectable by JavaScript."
   - Unique approach (HID vs Selenium)

5. **cc-dump** — debugging tool for AI development
   - Description set via API: "HTTP proxy intercepting Anthropic API calls. Shows unified diffs of system prompt changes between requests."
   - Debug Claude Code itself

6. **tesseract-react** — hardware/creative coding
   - Description set via API: "React UI for Draco kinetic LED sculpture. Real physical art installation, Docker deployment, iPad/local network control."
   - Physical art installation

## Narrative

These pins tell a coherent story:
- **rad-shell**: Established work (8 years, most stars)
- **oscilla-animator-v2**: Current ambitious project (753 commits)
- **cherry-chrome-mcp**: AI tooling (recent)
- **browsergeist**: Novel technical approach (OS-level HID)
- **cc-dump**: Meta-tool (debug AI tools themselves)
- **tesseract-react**: Hardware/art (physical installation)

Together they showcase: longevity, active development, AI integration, novel approaches, meta-tooling, and creative coding.

## Status

- [x] Descriptions set via `gh repo edit`
- [ ] Repos pinned manually on GitHub profile
